Package com.dkriesel.snipe.training

Contains a class where to put in the training data for your neural network and one that contains several error measurement methods.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ErrorMeasurement This class contains several methods of error measurement for use in a static way.
TrainingSampleLesson This class represents a set of training samples in order to train a neural network.
 

Package com.dkriesel.snipe.training Description

Contains a class where to put in the training data for your neural network and one that contains several error measurement methods.
